|execute ddl|!-
CREATE TABLE data_types
(
  a_bigint                BIGINT
, a_bit                   BIT
, a_char                  CHAR(1)
, a_date                  DATE
, a_decimal               DECIMAL
, a_double                DOUBLE
, a_integer               INTEGER
, a_money                 MONEY
, a_numeric               NUMERIC
, a_real                  REAL
, a_smallint              SMALLINT
, a_smallmoney            SMALLMONEY
, a_text                  TEXT
, a_time                  TIME
, a_tinyint               TINYINT
, a_unsigned_bigint       UNSIGNED BIGINT
, a_unsigned_int          UNSIGNED INT
, a_varchar               VARCHAR(1)
, a_timestamp             TIMESTAMP
, a_datetime              DATETIME
, a_smalldatetime         SMALLDATETIME
)
-!|
